desc_var_en: Geometric average of the education, health, and income indicators
Health component of the Human Development Index
Education component of the Human Development Index
Income component of the Human Development Index
Life expectancy at birth.
Child mortality rate (1 year) per 1000.
Ratio between the elder (65 and over) and young (14 and under).
Ratio between the sum of the elder (65 and over) and the young (14 and under) in relation to the adult population.
Expected number of years of study at 18 years.
Share of the population 15 years or over who cannot read or write a simple note.
Share of the population 18 years or over who cannot read or write a simple note.
Share of the population 25 years or over who cannot read or write a simple note.
Share of the population 25 years or over who completed Primary Education (elementray school)
Share of the population 25 years or over who completed Secondary Education (high school)
Share of the population 25 years or over who completed Tertiary Education (college)
Share of population aged 6-14 enrolled in primary school
Share of population aged 15-17 enrolled in secondary school
Share of population aged 18-24 enrolled in tertiary school
Average Household Income per capita (HIPC)
Average Household Income per capita (HIPC) excluding zero income households.
Average income received by workers
Percentage of income from labor income.
Average Household Income per capita (HIPC) from the poorest quintile.
Average Household Income per capita (HIPC) from the 2nd quintile.
Average Household Income per capita (HIPC) from the 3rd quintile.
Average Household Income per capita (HIPC) from the 4th quintile.
Average Household Income per capita (HIPC) from the richest quintile.
Average Household Income per capita (HIPC) from the richest decile.
Ratio between the average HIPC of top 10% with the bottom 40%
Ratio between the average HIPC of top 20% with the bottom 40%
Family income per capita Gini Index. A value closer to 0 indicates more equality while a value closer to 1 indicates higher inequality.
The logarithm of the ratio of the arithmetic mean and the geometric mean of the HIPC
Share of individuals with less than R$70 per month (Household Income per capita)
Share of individuals with less than R$140 per month (Household Income per capita)
Share of individuals with less than R$255 per month (Household Income per capita)
Average Household Income per capita among the individuals in extreme povery (less than R$70 per month)
Average Household Income per capita among the individuals in extreme povery (less than R$140 per month)
Average Household Income per capita among the individuals in extreme povery (less than R$255 per month)
Total population
Total population aged between 0 and 18 years.
Total population aged between 18 and 65 years.
Total population aged 65 years or over.
